item.description:
Conspiracy Cafe on the web

Every 2 weeks Boston 911 Truth holds a Conspiracy Cafe - a partly social, partly educational, partly action-oriented event.

Location: the Democracy Center, 45 Mt. Auburn Street, Harvard Square, Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Directions on the DC site.

Several of us from MV911T plan to go to the Cafe this week. Let's work on carpooling details to make it a fun, economical event together. As we've done before, we can have dinner together in Harvard Square with other area activists.

The $5 fee we list is for gas money for carpoolers. There is no charge for the Conspiracy Cafe, though I'm sure Boston 911 Truth would appreciate donations to cover the cost of rental of the Democracy Center. They also will have an extensive selection of books and DVD's for sale, so your purchase will help finance the Cafe.

-------------------------

CARPOOLING:
Meet up for carpooling at:

Concord and Northern: Exit 17 Park and Ride lot; time: 1PM
Manchester: Murphy's Tap Room lot - 1:30PM
Nashua: Exit 6 Visitor's Center lot - 2:00PM
(If we are late at these stops, please be patient. We're working on developing a schedule that works. If you're at the stop and wondering if we're still coming, call 233-1058 or 828-8306)

If you want to go earlier, you should proceed on your own., or email us at MerrimackValley911Truth@gmail.com to discuss.
item.name: Conspiracy Cafe - Cambridge, Massachusetts
